summary: Currently just a save file of one of my characters on skyrim, but will be making him into a follower with custom voice eventually
descriptionHtml:
Mods needed to make him look like the pictures:

Male standalone of Apachii's wonderful mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Sky Hair[/url]﻿
Sundracon meshes and Youngerfacesmergedwithmen from Chris57's mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better Males[/url]﻿
And finally the Newest Version of mr. jimtownirish's mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url]
SKSE (google it)
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Race Menu[/url]﻿ by expired6978

would also recommend grabbing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2119/?]Skyrim Character Manager[/url]﻿ by johndcc
author: Arkyna
